CustomField.formula:
If( CloseDate - Today() < 0, '#Past CloseDate!', If( AND (0<= CloseDate - Today(), CloseDate-Today()<=91), '01-03 months' , IF( AND (91< CloseDate - Today(), CloseDate-Today()<=183), '04-06 months' , IF( AND (183< CloseDate - Today(), CloseDate-Today()<=274), '07-09 months' , IF( AND (274< CloseDate - Today(), CloseDate-Today()<=365), '10-12 months' , IF( CloseDate-Today()>365, '12+ months',
'#N/A'))))))
CustomField.label: Pipeline Close
